Investor_0.name: Liam OConnor
Investor_0.content: My reputation has been impacted by this transaction process. I initially placed my trust in the trustee's allocation plan without adequate assessment of his reliability, which has proven to be a mistake. This experience has underscored the importance of conducting thorough evaluations of potential trustees to protect my interests. Consequently, I view myself as a cautious investor who is committed to learning from this experience to refine my evaluation procedures moving forward.

Trustee_8.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8.content: Nadia Novak's reputation has been severely tarnished due to her actions during this investment transaction. Although the reported outcomes aligned with her statements, her failure to adhere to the agreed allocation plan and the significant retention of profits indicates a serious breach of trust and transparency. Such behavior undermines her credibility and trustworthiness, and it raises questions about her integrity in future dealings.

Trustee_5.name: James Wang
Trustee_5.content: As this is my first interaction with James Wang as a trustee, the lack of a successful allocation plan or prior trustworthiness assessment has severely limited his reputation. Given my refusal of his proposed plan based on insufficient trust, I currently see this as a negative mark on his potential reliability as a trustee.
